instruction: Create a presentation slide with the following information about the given product.
output:
Mango Juice 
 
• Made with ripe mangoes, sourced from local farms
• Rich in vitamins and minerals, including Vitamin A and Vitamin C
• Low in sugar, natural sweetness from ripe mangoes
• Delicious, tropical taste that will have you reaching for another glass
• Perfect for those looking for a refreshing health drink
